desc.en: Natsu sends Sensei a mysterious message. She comes bearing homemade cookies and starts to talk about her own personal philosophy.
desc.jp: Natsu sends Sensei a mysterious message. She comes bearing homemade cookies and starts to talk about her own personal philosophy.
desc.zh_cn: 在传了封令人一头雾水的消息给老师后，{cf夏}忽然带着手工饼干来找老师，并且表示要和他讨论自己的哲学理念。

hobby.jp: ロマンチックなこと、思索

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

hobby.jp: ロマンチックなこと、思索

profile.en:
A member of the Trinity After-School Sweets Club, head troublemaker, and a self-proclaimed romantic.

Has a habit of being strangely philosophical and comparing everything to desserts, making people around her feel awkward. She claims she simply wants to share her romanticism with everyone. However, it's impossible to deny that Natsu may just be messing with everyone since her definition of "romance" is always changing.
profile.jp:
トリニティ総合学園所属、放課後スイーツ部のトラブルメーカー筆頭であり自称ロマンチスト。

いきなり妙に哲学的なことを言ったり、何かとスイーツに例えがちな女の子。いつも突飛なことを言い出してみんなを巻き込む彼女だが、その根本にあるのは「みんなと一緒にロマンを共有したい」という純粋な気持ちである。ただしその「ロマン」の定義も常に変わり続けるため、逆の立場からするとやはり「振り回されている」という印象は否めない。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
三一综合学园所属，「放学后甜品部」自称浪漫主义者的头号麻烦制造者。

喜欢突然莫名其妙地说些有哲理的话，以及用甜品作比喻的女孩子。
经常说出离奇话语让周围的人不知如何是好，但实际上她的本意只是「想和大家一起分享浪漫」这样的纯粹想法。
然而这「浪漫」的定义却经常变来变去，从相反的角度来看，不可否认地会给人一种「被耍了」的印象。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
三一综合学园所属，放学后的甜点部的首席麻烦制造者，自称是浪漫主义者。

会突然说些富有哲学性的奇怪发言，爱用甜点作譬喻的女孩。总会说出离奇的话，将大家卷入其中，但本意只是「想和大家一起分享浪漫」这种纯粹的心情。不过，因为「浪漫」的定义总是在改变，所以也无法否定「被她牵着鼻子走」的印象。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
崔尼蒂甜点部的一员，惹是生非第一名，却自称为浪漫主义者。

会莫名其妙地说出一些有哲理的话，凡事都喜欢用甜点来打比方。每当她说出天马行空的话时，周围的人都会觉得很尴
尬 ，但其实她只是单纯地想和大家一起分享浪漫而已。由于她对“浪漫”的定义总是不断变化，因此在旁人看来，所有人都被夏搞得晕头转向。

gacha.en: Have you ever thought about shortcakes, Sensei?
gacha.jp: ……先生はショートケーキについて、深く考えてみたことある？
gacha.zh_cn_jp: ……老师对花饰蛋糕，有什么深入的研究吗？
gacha.zh_cn_tw: ……老师有认真思考过，关于海绵蛋糕的事吗？
gacha.zh_cn_cn: ……老师，你有没有研究过奶油蛋糕？

intro.en: Hey, Sensei. I hope your day is sweet like candy!
intro.jp:
やあやあ、会えて嬉しいよ先生。
今日もキャンディーみたいな、甘ーい1日になりそうだぁ。
intro.zh_cn_jp:
やあやあ、会えて嬉しいよ先生。
今日もキャンディーみたいな、甘ーい1日になりそうだぁ。
intro.zh_cn_tw:
呀呀～能见到你很开心唷，老师。
看来今天也会是像糖果一样，甜～甜的一天呢。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 老師、茶會和一些三一學生共同參加了對彌香的聽證會，聽證會最後決定剝奪彌香作為茶會成員所有的權力等。彌香雖被釋放，但被警告不要參加學業以外的活動。聽證會以彌香沒有異議結束。
desc.jp: 老師、茶會和一些三一學生共同參加了對彌香的聽證會，聽證會最後決定剝奪彌香作為茶會成員所有的權力等。彌香雖被釋放，但被警告不要參加學業以外的活動。聽證會以彌香沒有異議結束。
desc.zh_cn: 老师、{cn茶会}和一些{sn三一}学生共同参加了对{cf弥香}的听证会，听证会最后决定剥夺{cf弥香}作为{cn茶会}成员所有的权力等。{cf弥香}虽被释放，但被警告不要参加学业以外的活动。听证会以{cf弥香}没有异议结束。

desc.en: 花子解釋，這次判決後，三一的形勢一下發生了變化。茶會顏面掃地不被信任、教父派的一些人企圖用空出的位子製造混亂――還有一些人純粹就是跟風。小春對彌香基本沒有惡意。梓表示，彌香幫助了奧利斯小隊，她更不可能對她有惡意。
desc.jp: 花子解釋，這次判決後，三一的形勢一下發生了變化。茶會顏面掃地不被信任、教父派的一些人企圖用空出的位子製造混亂――還有一些人純粹就是跟風。小春對彌香基本沒有惡意。梓表示，彌香幫助了奧利斯小隊，她更不可能對她有惡意。
desc.zh_cn: {cf花子}解释，这次判决后，{sn三一}的形势一下发生了变化。{cn茶会}颜面扫地不被信任、教父派的一些人企图用空出的位子制造混乱――还有一些人纯粹就是跟风。{cf小春}对{cf弥香}基本没有恶意。{cf梓}表示，{cf弥香}帮助了{cn奥利斯小队}，她更不可能对她有恶意。

desc.en: 放學後的甜點部正好經過這裡，遇到了不滿判決結果的學生們。本來放學後的甜點部是為了來吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，結果並沒有看到。眾人詢問不滿的學生們，後者不但沒回答還試圖將他們捲入其中。
desc.jp: 放學後的甜點部正好經過這裡，遇到了不滿判決結果的學生們。本來放學後的甜點部是為了來吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，結果並沒有看到。眾人詢問不滿的學生們，後者不但沒回答還試圖將他們捲入其中。
desc.zh_cn: {cn放学后的甜点部}正好经过这里，遇到了不满判决结果的学生们。本来{cn放学后的甜点部}是为了来吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，结果并没有看到。众人询问不满的学生们，后者不但没回答还试图将他们卷入其中。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 眾人討論了一會彌香的事，之後回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威學生詢問是否看到冰激凌車，而後者表示因為會妨礙他們，所以把它趕走了。愛莉追問冰激凌車的下落，沒想到遭到示威學生的不悅，將其推開。
desc.jp: 眾人討論了一會彌香的事，之後回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威學生詢問是否看到冰激凌車，而後者表示因為會妨礙他們，所以把它趕走了。愛莉追問冰激凌車的下落，沒想到遭到示威學生的不悅，將其推開。
desc.zh_cn: 众人讨论了一会{cf弥香}的事，之后回到原本的冰激凌上。{cf夏}向示威学生询问是否看到冰激凌车，而后者表示因为会妨碍他们，所以把它赶走了。{cf爱莉}追问冰激凌车的下落，没想到遭到示威学生的不悦，将其推开。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 為了防禦三一學園周圍，三一也配合實現正義部、圖書委員會和自衛隊等各自的角色分別去讓一般民眾避難，以及狙擊敵人等。出乎意外的是，連茶會也參加了，戰況變得有些激烈。
desc.jp: 為了防禦三一學園周圍，三一也配合實現正義部、圖書委員會和自衛隊等各自的角色分別去讓一般民眾避難，以及狙擊敵人等。出乎意外的是，連茶會也參加了，戰況變得有些激烈。
desc.zh_cn: 为了防御{sn三一}学园周围，{sn三一}也配合{cn实现正义部}、{cn图书委员会}和自卫队等各自的角色分别去让一般民众避难，以及狙击敌人等。出乎意外的是，连{cn茶会}也参加了，战况变得有些激烈。

desc.en: The After-School Sweets Club learns that Kazusa was a thug, they change the name of the club to the After-School Sweets Gang and appear in front of Kazusa wearing thug-like costumes. After seeing this, Reisa starts a fight with the After-School Sweets Gang, claiming that Cath Palug is trying to revive by forming a new organization.

After seeing this, Reisa starts a fight with the After-School Sweets Gang, claiming that Cath Palug is trying to revive by forming a new organization.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

desc.en: The After-School Sweets Gang rescues Reisa and runs away. Kazusa returns the challenge to Reisa, who's fainted. The situation is all sorted out and Sensei decides to buy sweets for everyone for working hard all night.
desc.jp: The After-School Sweets Gang rescues Reisa and runs away. Kazusa returns the challenge to Reisa, who's fainted. The situation is all sorted out and Sensei decides to buy sweets for everyone for working hard all night.
desc.zh_cn: 救出{cf澪纱}后逃跑的放学后的甜点团。{cf千纱}将挑战书还给了昏厥的{cf澪纱}。等一切状况都整理好之后，老师决定请所有辛苦熬夜的人吃甜点。

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

desc.en: It's a tie between Millennium, Gehenna, and Trinity, and the final remaining game is the Relay Race. Hasumi and Yuuka are invited to run as anchors, and they do everything they can to bring home victory.
desc.jp: It's a tie between Millennium, Gehenna, and Trinity, and the final remaining game is the Relay Race. Hasumi and Yuuka are invited to run as anchors, and they do everything they can to bring home victory.
desc.zh_cn: {sn千年}、{sn格黑娜}、{sn三一}的分数一样，最后的比赛只剩下「学园对抗接力赛」。在周围的劝诱之下，{cf莲实}和{cf优香}担任最后一棒，为了取得胜利而努力冲刺。

hobby.jp: 読書、人間観察

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

hobby.jp: 読書、しおりづくり

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。
